Class DiceBoard

java.lang.Object
  DiceBoard

public class DiceBoard
extends java.lang.Object

The Diceboard class keeps a record of all the five dice.

resetBoard

public void resetBoard()
This method resets the board to the initial conditions for the next player to have his turn.

rollBoard

public void rollBoard()
This method determines the roll state of every die in the created array. If a die in the array is not locked it is rolled and finally, the roll number is updated.
